h1_38: Mayo Clinic College of Medicine and Science (Phoenix) Program
h3_39: Mayo Clinic College of Medicine and Science
span_48: Mayo School of Graduate Medical Education
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Built-in TY year tailored for radiology for 6 candidates. Experienced faculty with impressive credentials to assist and mentor our residents during their training and to help expand their network when seeking post training employment. Faculty include many former PDs from other highly regarded institutions. The R4 year is almost entirely elective. Two residents each year may apply for ESIR. We also offer a nuclear medicine pathway. Mayo brand and world class faculty ensure resident success.
